name: Tasnim
causes:
Possible causes of the patient's symptoms may include:

1. Viral or bacterial infection
2. Dehydration
3. Stress or tension
4. Allergies or sinus issues
5. Dietary triggers for migraines
6. Hormonal imbalances
7. Medication side effects
8. Sleep disturbances
9. Neurological disorders
10. Environmental factors such as exposure to pollutants or chemicals.
tests:
that may be helpful.

1. Complete Blood Count (CBC)
2. C-reactive protein (CRP) test
3. Blood cultures
4. Lumbar puncture
5. CT scan or MRI of the brain
6. Electroencephalogram (EEG)
7. Sinus X-ray or CT scan
8. Migraine trigger test
9. Temporal artery biopsy
10. Thyroid function tests.
